subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
Cycling, Road
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Froome kept his overall lead after Stage 11, which was won by Rafal Majka, but a second video containing Froome’s confidential performance data was apparently leaked.
snippet: Froome kept his overall lead after Stage 11, which was won by Rafal Majka, but a second video containing Froome’s confidential performance data was apparently leaked.
